website_summaries.verdict: A versatile choice for the person who needs a table, chair and storage space all wrapped into one.
pros: Assembly is easy, no tools required
The round Keter table is lightweight and easy to move around
Made from a thick, sturdy waterproof plastic
The table can even double as an extra seat if need be
We were amazed at how much fit into the storage area of this seemingly small table
cons: The table top doesn't lock into the base

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This storage table is very nice, I'm impressed! I was downsizing from a huge deck box/bench that was in really bad condition. I wanted something smaller, easy to move around, that could double as a seat or table, and sealed well. I love it. The directions were easy to follow. But notice that you are recommended to wear gloves, so you don't pinch yourself snapping the pieces together. And it does take a little patience because they really do have to be pushed into place with a little strength so that they completely snap into place. I posted some photos for an idea of how much it holds and the scale compared to a dining chair.
customer_reviews.author: mygirlmom

customer_reviews.title: Durable and attractive table.
customer_reviews.text: The is a rugged large heavy duty but attractive table. I can store 2 large seat cushions and 3 throw pillows in it. It is rainproof and the top locks with a twist of the lid. It is light enough to carry. Putting together was a snap, literally no tools needed and I am not very strong and I was able to snap the pieces in place. After staying outside for 2 weeks near the edge of our woods no bugs got in and it was dry on the inside. Great Price for a great table.
customer_reviews.author: Oriphiel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our pool hose!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these. The first one hot delivered yesterday. It was super easy to assemble, everything fit together the first try. The picture I shared shows our 30 foot pool hose coiled up inside. There is still tons of room left. I ordered the second one to store the pool chemicals and the vacuum in. All if it could have easily fit in one container...but I don't like to have to move things to get the hose out and to put it away. These will be a great addition to our pool deck. Great for storage and gives us two more chairs too.
customer_reviews.author: KSH

customer_reviews.title: Great table & storage for porch
customer_reviews.text: I was able to put this together! By myself! I was looking for a table i could prop my feet on or place a drink / book on. I wasn't thinking about storage UNTIL I saw this table. We have a screened porch, but now if there is a heavy rain, I can put the decorative throw pillows in here. Also, I store three blankets (fall is upon us ... and we use our porch almost all year long!) We don't need it for such yet, but it's strong enough to be used for extra seating. I DEFINITELY recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a foot-rest and for storage on our front porch and this product met both those needs. It was actually fun to assemble. My husband and I assembled it, but I think that one person could probably do it. It is sturdy, good quality and heavy duty plastic. It is definitely resistant to rain, and heavy enough that it does not budge in a gusty thunderstorm. I would definitely recommend this product and would purchase it again if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Took almost 2 weeks to arrive and when it finally got here it was a nightmare to assemble due to defects. What a dissapointment!! Several of the snap together pieces were visibly warped and disfigured so they did not snap in without forceful and painstaking manipulation wirh various sharp objects. I am honestly really good at assembling things and i would not want to deal with this thing again! I thought the price was great but now i realize why!
customer_reviews.author: RDH

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for, but looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Just received and put it together. Many reviewers commented on troublesome bits. They were correct. Some of the side pieces were more roundly bent than others. A few never snapped together perfectly, no matter what I did. It’s together now, so we will see how waterproof it is and I’ll update my review accordingly. Also, the lid does NOT lock. It sits precariously on the top, just waiting to flip open with one little kick from one of our friendly neighborhood chipmunks. I’ll be placing something on top to avoid that situation. Give me a month and I’ll change my review to better if deserved.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Storage for bumper plates
customer_reviews.text: Easy, quick assembly. Parts give an audible "click" so you know it's correct. Perfect diameter for bumper plates. Holds 2x45s, 2x25s, and 2x10s with enough headspace for another pair of 10s.
customer_reviews.author: million

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty and strong. Super easy to put together. HINTS....because of some comments about damage, inspect EACH piece when you remove from the box. You don’t want to get to the last panel to find out there’s a problem. It’s a little tricky and you need some strength to snap each panel together to form the barrel. As I lightly connected each panel, I used an adjustable pliers to grab and secure the locks in place. Top lid is super strong. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: DEM

customer_reviews.title: Quality control is a huge issue mine is impossible to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I Wish I had read the reviews about this product before purchasing because you can tell that at the beginning of manufacturing people had an easy time putting it together but that is not the case I have wrestled this for two hours it puts together but it will not snap so the pieces fit but it’s very wonky I’m very disappointed and I will probably end up returning
customer_reviews.author: M. Adkins

customer_reviews.title: a little difficult to assemble but nice
customer_reviews.text: my only issue with this was putting it together. It wasn't as easy as I expected because the "barrel" parts wouldn't snap together like the instructions said. Because of this, it kept falling apart before I could get it snapped into the bottom piece. I think it would have been easier with a second set of hands. After a little frustration and some ninja moves I was able to hold it together long enough to get the bottom on, which held it all together to finish with the top. It fits 3 throw pillows, a chair cushion, a lounge seat cushion, and a throw blanket nicely. It also is sturdy to sit on and seems like it will last.
customer_reviews.author: shauna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pool equipment!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Impressed. Was looking for a way to store/hide me pool skimmer vacuum and the hoses that are attached to it. This thing literally snaps into place in minutes (make sure to align each side piece each time and watch your fingers). It literally took me minutes. I was afraid before purchasing that I wouldn't be able to fit everything but that was no problem and I even have extra room. Looks nice and will serve for extra seating. Got to get this thing. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Nice design with issues
customer_reviews.text: This unit is exactly what we were looking for. Nice design, it is waterproof but, the have quality control issues. There was plenty of excess plastic to trim on my assembly pieces and the lid had a defect. The top piece to the lid was cut too short. I called Keter and after about a 30 minute wait I spoke with customer service and they promptly sent out a replacement lid. The lid arrived in five days only it was grey. I called again (another 30 minute wait) told them my problem and they said they were sending another one out. We will see. Overall I like the table very much and hope that I get the right part eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Admit One

customer_reviews.title: Some water does get in it.  Only store items that can get wet.
customer_reviews.text: The amount of storage space and the look of this are great. Easy to assemble. Some water does get in it, but not much. I use it to store items that can get wet, my watering can, a tarp, plastic bottles, a bag of sand etc... It appears the water is coming in at the bottom but I’m not 100% sure. I would not store my chair cushions in it unless you have some type of liner in the bottom to protect them from water. I’m in FL, so we get rain. The true test will be soon when the 1st hurricane comes.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: I have this on my back porch where I often pot plants in the summer. It took no time at all to assemble. I can put all of my planting supplies including soil, extra pots, and other miscellaneous items and still have room for other things if I need it. This also serves as additional seating when needed. I live in New England and it has held up nicely in the winter so far. I will probably turn it in the spring so that it doesn't get that faded look only on one side. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: clarkemason

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Low profile in my small condo patio, but holds a lot. I thought I would have trouble assembling it on my own, but nope, I finished in about twenty minutes. It all snaps together and I just exchanged the pieces around if one didn't seem to snap correctly. Yes it seems waterproof. I only gave it a 4 for sturdiness only because not sure how it would hold up if a heavy person sat on it a lot. If you don't use it for that, I would say sturdy. Someone who is not heavy can sit on it for short periods of time I would think, just could be hard on it if done regularly I would think.
customer_reviews.author: TforTennessee

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store outdoor cushions and then act as a table top. Others have mentioned that it isn't completely waterproof if it's sitting in a puddle of water, so I flex-sealed the bottom of the inside. It's been through a few downpours and everything inside has been dry. It's doing what I wanted, so I can't complain much. Assembly was easy but a little painful on the fingers. There's a plasticy smell as can be expected. It's fairly big, so you may want to measure it out.
customer_reviews.author: CTCraftBrew

customer_reviews.title: Nice weatherproof storage box
customer_reviews.text: Weatherproof, great for housing a automatic dry pet food feeder,-- once raised on a cinder block base this container allow us to rig up a place to safely feed stray cats, buy drilling out a few holes in the bottom -- one for a makeshift food shoot and the other for electrical cords,both connection are to a covered outdoor outlet, we also secured the container from being carried away by attaching it to a wooden deck post, so far it has worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Harder to put together than it looks
customer_reviews.text: Some of the tabs weren't exactly ready to click into place on the next piece.... had to use a box cutter to cut off pieces that were still attached on the tabs which weren't allowing them to snap into place on the next section of the side walls. Once the side walls were connected the rest was easy to assemble. Not sure yet how weatherproof it is, but doesn't "sound" very sturdy when I sit on it and I'm only 150lbs! Works fine for what we intended, pool storage of small items.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: What a Nice Surprise - Use as a Watering Hose Holder
customer_reviews.text: Someone else inquired about using this storage box as hose holder - which were my thoughts exactly. After searching and searching for a hose holder - they all seemed too expensive for what you were getting for your money and most simply looked too small for the job. This deck box is perfect. I fortunately had a spot to place it in my landscaping where I can store my hoses, sprinkler, and if I feeling like taking a break I can sit on it. Definitely a Best Buy.
customer_reviews.author: OneSpiritGal

customer_reviews.title: Deck Chair cover storage
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product to have something to throw outdoor furniture covers in to, for short storage. The cabinet easily holds my love seat and two large chair covers (heavy duty water proof). It can double as a chair itself and the round design leaves no sharp corners for the grandchildren to run in to. Assembly requires no tools (flat blade screw driver is handy to help bend plastic parts for easier assembly), and is easier with two people to hold pieces and to snap together.
customer_reviews.author: scott britain

customer_reviews.title: Difficult, frustrating assembly!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to store a Solo Bonfire during the winter. It was very difficult to assemble the sides. There are 8 side panels with 3 catches to lock together until each if the 3 catches “click” into place. As noted in other reviews, the tabs didn’t align properly and it took much pressure to get them together. I spent about 1.5 hours putting it together (needed a break in between - it was very frustrating). I have much experience putting all sorts of complex things together. These brittle plastic parts did not want to line up. Maybe, like others have noted, mine was defective. If you get one that goes together easily, congratulations. But beware - yours may not.
customer_reviews.author: BML

customer_reviews.title: be patient
customer_reviews.text: this is great! it looks good, holds alot, supports weight and i am super glad i purchased it. that said, putting it together, that was just shy of a nightmare. it is plastic, snaps together, you would think that would be easy, nope, needed 4 hands to do it and a few screwdrivers to guide the male to female properly. in the end it was worth it but be aware, it may be listed as easy assembly but go in with your expectations low on that account.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki S. Cadieux

customer_reviews.title: What a complete piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: Garbage! This took every ounce of effort to put this thing back in the box. Seriously the “teeth” no where near line up. The product was cracking trying to get it together. There were prices with sharp edges that looked like they melted wrong when making. I have seen several pics of what I am taking about and I kept my fingers crossed that mine would be ok. It was NOT. The price was right and that’s why I decided to chance it. Just. Don’t. Do. It. Find something higher quality
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: poorly engineered DIY
customer_reviews.text: NO WAY ! can the pics that were shipped to ME be assembled the way they describe! I can only comment on the poorly fitting pics that were shipped to ME: perhaps everyone else received beautifully fitting pieces. Yeah, RIGHT, HAH HAH. I will NEVER AGAIN make a purchase that calls on ME to assemble: I DONT WORK ON THEIR ASSEMBLY LINE. From hereon anyone who hopes to sell me something better ship it fully assembled, RIGHT OUT OF THE BOX. or, you don't get MY BUCK$.
customer_reviews.author: econPROF

customer_reviews.title: Updated
customer_reviews.text: 7/2 - Finally received notification of refund, supposed to get in two or three days. I have been asked to take down the review but will just update it. Original review. Pieces are poorly formed and won't fit together easily. Some show obvious damage during manufacture that misshaped them. No way to get together and make stay together. Trying to contact customer service now for a return, no response from them for two days.
customer_reviews.author: RSKDLOVE

customer_reviews.title: Style and size was nice but lid finish is trash worthy
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I got. I sent the first one back because the lid looked like it was sanded prior to being placed in the box. The second one was no different. The bottom sides and even the brim that the lid sits in have a really nice finish but the lid looks horrible. You can see in the picture as I run my hand over the lid all the shavings of plastic come off on my hand. This thing was a great size and other than looks great but this lid looks like it's something that I've had for years and it's just worn out and old.
customer_reviews.author: johng

customer_reviews.title: Once put together it's fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I really love it, it's the perfect size and seems to be sturdy. Building it on the other hand required a lot force. Once I had put the first few pieces together I thought I figured it out, little did I realize how hard it was going to be as I enclosed the circle. I must have spent an hour putting it together. Once I got most pieces together another size would separate, super frustrating. I did it, so it can be done. Just be patient.
customer_reviews.author: Always Amazoning

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured. Terrific!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to serve as a small coffee table to go on our deck seating area and it is perfect. I love that it has storage and it looks super, even better then the picture in my opinion. Easy to twist and remove lid. This will be under an awning so I think it will hold up well, but it is my opinion that if this was to be left out in direct sunlight all day every day, along with rain or snow it may fade some. Took my husband about 3 minutes to put together, super easy.
customer_reviews.author: TN

customer_reviews.title: Utterly frustrated
customer_reviews.text: I sincerely wish I could give this zero stars. I have been at this for 2 hours and as at least one other reviewer stated the interlocking pieces are defective. They do not lock and stay in place. They also do not match up with the top and bottom pieces which causes the thing to fall apart. I have never had any issues with assembling anything in my life. I sincerely wish I could get my money back and get these last two hours of my life back. Please stay away from this item. Not worth the hassle & aggravation.
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: Super tough to put together but worth the effort
customer_reviews.text: So, it seemed like in the one we got, the plastic mold they used to form the pieces was a bit off because this took my wife and I together quite a while to get it put together, including needing a pocket knife to shave off some stray pieces of plastic that looked like they were globs of extra that were blocking the pieces from clicking together. That being said, once it was built, we've loved it since, it looks good, it's lightweight, the seams aren't obvious, and it has kept the wood and marshmallow skewers nice and dry during several rounds of rain.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Clark

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Its a little challenging to assemble. And water went in when rain. And now the color is fading away after less than 1 week. Very horrible
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was super fast. Click, click, click. No screws. The package was also very well designed, the instruction manual too. Because the base is hard plastic, I can put heavy things here. After several thunderstorms, it proved to be waterproof. I am using it now to keep my gardening tools, so they are always easy to reach.
customer_reviews.author: Orquidlady

customer_reviews.title: Trashed it
customer_reviews.text: After trying for several hours, I got all but the last section of the sides snapped together. I finally gave up in frustration and began taking it apart to return it, but I couldn't get some of the sections unsnapped! If you want to save your sanity, heed these negative reviews and purchase a similar product that is square or rectangular. The circular shape contributed to the difficulty of the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: K Chidwick

customer_reviews.title: Assembly too Difficult
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT easy to "snap" together. I'm a pretty strong woman and about halfway through trying to get to the snap part I had to stop. I could only get about 3 of the snaps to occur out of the15 that needed snapping. I even had gloves on. I'm going to buy a rubber mallet to try to hammer the snaps into the slots. If that doesn't work, I'll have to return this product.
customer_reviews.author: theartofwine

customer_reviews.title: A Very Well Made Round Storage Box
customer_reviews.text: At first when I was assembling it I was a bit negative about it and I didn't think it was going to be a good purchase. After I assembled it I was surprised at hot sturdy it actually it. You can sit on it, but then again I suggest you are careful and I weight less than 160 lbs. Lots of room to store stuff. My wife made a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Mister M

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for (even though I really wanted it in gray which was sold out). It's the perfect size to act as a coffee table/foot rest and easily fits my throw pillows, lanterns, and other small yard items when the weather turns. Seems sturdy, excellent price, and kept my pillows dry during the first rain...all I could ask for!
customer_reviews.author: thezopfs

customer_reviews.title: This is a ripoff! Not easy to put together like advertised.
customer_reviews.text: My husband who can fix and put anything together spend 30 minutes trying to connect these pieces together that would not snap in place and stay like it says in the manual. The couple of pieces he did get snapped together, then he couldn't get apart, they had defective broken parts and he ended up having to get a tool to pull them apart and then cracked a piece of it while trying to get it apart. So can't send it back now! Should not be this difficult! The plastic material is cheap and I can't say if it's waterproof or not, but I would not trust putting it out in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! It’s pretty and functional at the same time. It fits my kids helmets, roller blades, knee pads...as well as their ripstick. Keeps our garden and backyard neat and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Triplets

customer_reviews.title: Suuuuuper cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this outdoor storage table. It matches my lounger perfectly, and it’s quite bigger than I thought it would be. It was mostly easy to put together, except for the last one or two panes—which were pretty tough to attach. I had to bring in my pliers to finish. Otherwise, a perfect buy!
customer_reviews.author: Cali

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with this purchase! I was looking for something to use as a coffee table by our patio fire pit, and this is the perfect height and size! Plus, I can store my daughter's sandbox toys in it, to protect them from the elements and keep from tracking sand all over the house. Very sturdy and doesn't look cheap/tacky. Have recommended this his item to people already!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Parrott

customer_reviews.title: Great storage and seat in one.
customer_reviews.text: I love this box. It holds a lot of stuff and so far has been waterproof. It did arrive with some panels that were defective but I called the company and they just asked me a few questions then sent me out replacement parts. The box is great, the customer service was great, they definitely need to work on the quality control though. The pieces were obviously defective. Would have been 5 stars if everything came right the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quality Plastic
customer_reviews.text: This was incredibly easy to assemble. Not sure how anyone could have trouble? I bought this to put at the end of my driveway for parcels being delivered. It's heavy enough that it does not blow away empty, and the lid stays in place. The engineered weep holes drain water quite well and keep the inside dry. Bonus: The barrel container looks like a stack of tires from the road to detour package thieves.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kristyniak

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Everything I hoped it would be! My husband had it Snapped together in minutes without gloves as some reviews have stated were needed. The lid comes off easily for easy access to what is stored. I was concerned snaps for would difficult. Lid doesn’t snap but rather sets “inside” the base.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Using as a table between 2 chairs in the patio and storing pool chemicals inside. Was larger then I expected but that's a good thing. Clicking the rounded side wall pieces in while rolling it on the ground seemed to work best, tabs can be a little tough to click into place.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Tidied up
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to tidiy up the deck and patio. bought 4. !)for koi pond food and pond items on deck. 2) for firewood and stuff for chiminea. 3) for garden tools and bags of open soil products used frequently 4) for bird seed and turtle feed. None of them are full at this time. Lots of room. All are used as tables near seating areas.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Needed a "ottoman" that was weatherproof for Upstate NY and also had storage. This was a great buy. Slightly challenging to put together, had to get things lined up just so, but have had for over a month and it holds up really well, good size, and looks nice even after putting tools and puppy paws on it. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: K S

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to write home about but the quality seems acceptable. Not super strong but good enough.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to write home about but the quality seems acceptable. Not super strong but good enough. You actually build the barrel from many parts - about 6 portions of the circumference clip together into the base. The round lid on top is removable. It seems to have a lip inside with holes that allows the water to drain out the sides of the top rather than seeping into the container itself so that is good.
customer_reviews.author: C Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Practical storage
customer_reviews.text: No tools needed to assemble this but it took some time and finesse to click pieces together since they all have to fit at the correct angle to make a circle. Otherwise once done it looks great! Very functional...Can fit outdoor pillows, extra bug repellant, extra candles, store hammock at night, and room for more. Can be for seating or a table. Thinking of getting a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Hello Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Thin plastic & scratches super easy. The only reason I didn’t return it ...
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously hard to put together. None of the pieces “snapped” together, many had warped & bent edges that plain just didn’t fit. So the entire thing had to be disassembled & reassembled before I could come up with a combination where the all pieces actually fit together & I could could complete it. Thin plastic & scratches super easy. The only reason I didn’t return it is I scratched a few pieces trying to get them to fit together. Way overpriced - don’t bother.
customer_reviews.author: RZ Black

customer_reviews.title: Well made for a plastic piece.
customer_reviews.text: Update @ 4 months or so... Still going strong into spring. A+ This thing is easy to put together and directs all water through the Lid's handle openings and keeps the interior dry, even after a severe rain storm left out in the open. This ROCKS!
customer_reviews.author: benvoice

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: After the first container got lost in the mail, I finally received a replacement. The container is made of good quality plastic, easy to put together...everything just snaps in place. I have mine on our deck, it will have a duel purpose (storage and extra seating).So far we are pleased with the way it looks on the deck.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outside storage & seating!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use at our permanent camper. My 12 year old son and his friend built this all by themselves! We are using it to store all of our dog things in - leashes, food, treats, toys, etc. And we put it on the end of the picnic table to use as an extra seat. It’s at a perfect height, perfect storage capacity, and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Rochol

customer_reviews.title: Love the look but a pain to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It came perfectly packaged. Perfect size for my balcony and I love the look. One of the curved piece is chipped but it doesn’t seem to affect the whole structure so I don’t bother to return it. It was hard for me to put this together on my own tho, so definitely grab another person to help. Anyway, it suits my need. I would buy it again and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: pmk618

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: The assembly is a joke. There is no way those pieces fit into the slots. Manufacture has not made the slots to fit and snap as set forth in the directions. It would take two people to hold them in to get the assembly possibly done. Once you get 3 pieces together then you try to fit the other pieces it all falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and big.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect and so much nicer to look at than your standard square containers. Keep our cushions dry and are easy to put together. NOTE: The tops do NOT lock. I thought they were twist-to-lock, but they do not. You set them on top and they should stay there. But that means you can't "over stuff" them and expect the lid to smoosh things down. It gets very windy here and the lids have still stayed on. So I'm not too worried about it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Edwards

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the porch or patio!
customer_reviews.text: Never has one item been so useful for the outdoor areas of your home! This deck box serves as a seat, a table, an ottoman, and has an incredibly spacious interior to store whatever may be lying around-like half bags of soil, kid’s toys, etc. It’s also aesthetic, well-made, and takes all of five minutes to assemble by yourself. This was a steal for the price and I wouldn’t hesitate to buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This thing had huge storage. I put our breath stuff and gardening stuff in this thing. Very sturdy, we've had some rough storms, but no water was found inside👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was so difficult to assemble! It took two of us trying to force the pieces together, with the occasional tap from a hammer to get it. Sometimes the pieces would click right in and other times they wouldn't. I'm still not convinced every piece is clicked into place; we're depending on the top and bottom pieces to hold the thing together. We haven't had a lot of rain yet, so it seems waterproof but we'll see. The storage capacity is wonderful though and it's a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Adams

customer_reviews.title: Top notch product, Above the rest. Buy the Best. You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the 5 star reviews. This is everything and more for a great pool hose and small equipment storage box. Snap it together and ready to fill with your things. Love it! Their larger pool storage box is great for all your outdoor pillows and toys etc. We love that product as well. Can't beat the Keter products!
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but doesn't seem to be waterproof
customer_reviews.text: As resin plastic furniture goes, it has a nice appearance and is wide enough to store covers fit outdoor furniture. It's easy to assemble in about ten minutes. It doesn't appear to be leak-proof, however. Mine had about two inches of water in it and ruined a radio. I may need to experiment with positioning of the top.
customer_reviews.author: E. Pershing

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this item to store water. It is not designed to store water. I did purchase two patio cushion seats for my two patio chairs, I put the cushions inside the storage container. It is watertight and they fit perfectly. It looks really awesome as a table. I wish I could attach a picture.
customer_reviews.author: ALANNAH F.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and bigger than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: We leave this on our deck next to the hot tub to store pool supplies and it works perfectly. Even if it's pouring rain, everything inside is perfectly dry. We're not good at assembling things but were able to put this together in about 10 minutes. It was very satisfying hearing it click into place. Great value and great product!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Looks great...a pain to put together
customer_reviews.text: The final product of this is very attractive and if you don’t have to put it together yourself I highly recommend it. My husband was quite upset at how difficult it was to put together....parts weren’t lining up, etc. We use it as extra seating as well as storage.
customer_reviews.author: N. Fenty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an outdoor patio
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to store out grill items inside of and it works perfectly for that and can even double as a seat. Very useful. The one downside of this is that due to the color it gets very hot during the day and so nothing that is heat sensitive can be stored inside of it.
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect outdoor storage container
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble and is quite strong. It is watertight even in heavy rains. We store our outdoor fire bowl in it so that the unburned wood and ashes don't get rained on (make sure it's cool first). It makes a good seat too.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Worth the pain
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased other keter products and never had any issues. This was very difficult to put together. I will attribute that to all the untrimmed plastic on almost every piece. Once completed, it looks really nice and I think it will work well for storing barbecue supplies.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to backyard
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. I wish I had bought another one before covid. I think they are impacted by covid and that's why they are not available Right now. Assembly was not easy. I wish the video and the demonstrations were a little bit easier.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor table and storage.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect table in my yard. The storage is great for the loose pillows. They won't blow away, they stay clean and dry when not in use. Plenty of storage space for whatever you want to keep handy. It wasn't to difficult to assemble but is was timely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We wrestled not with flesh and blood....rather the assembly of the thing.
customer_reviews.text: What a pain in the butt to put together! I had to call in reinforcements after I wrestled it for an hour or more. I called the 800 customer service number..yeah, they didn't return my call. Overall, I like it now that it is together. I bought for pool supplies.
customer_reviews.author: CaNwa

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been very impressed with this! We use it for pool towels and if the lid is on properly, no water ever gets in! It holds a lot of towels too and makes a great little side table for drinks or snacks. Pretty design and has not faded any yet (been using three months).
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: A little extra seating
customer_reviews.text: I purchased This product for pool side towels.It was a little difficult to assembled because everything had to snap in place but once assembled it held together pretty well. It’s just as it’s pictured on this website. It’s water resistant plus it has extra seating for when we have lots of guest over.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy quality
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the box I was mad, all those little styrofoam dots were all over my room, after 2 weeks still finding them. I thought this plastic bin is not going to stay together. I WAS WRONG, I got it for my pool vacuum to store, it works perfectly and it is sturdy and doubles as a side table.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Mormol

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! *****
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed at this storage unit. I'm using it as a table that I can store patio pillows in when we're not home. It took 15 minutes to assemble...with no tools! WOW!! Just click the pieces together and voila...it looks very nice. And it doesn't feel flimsy either. It says it'll hold one adult sitting on it...and it does, I tried! Let me say again...WOW!
customer_reviews.author: Libs

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Bought this primarily to hold outdoor furniture cushions which it does beautifully. There's more storage capacity than I anticipated. I've also used it for a small propane grill. I just set it on a an old cookie sheet with a silicon mat on top and grilled my burgers.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I did not have these feelings how happy I was with my previous product - cart from the same brand, what I have had with this storage table, looks perfect on my patio, a lot of space to hide things inside, it is pretty huge. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vella86

customer_reviews.title: As attractive as it is functional
customer_reviews.text: Love this storage bin. My son put it together for me without complaining so that’s a testament to the ease of assembly. Looks great on my patio and blends well with decor. Bigger and Fits way more than I thought and withstood a major all night Florida rain storm it’s first day on the patio. Everything inside was completely dry the next morning. Serves as extra seating or a table as well and all at a very reasonable price. This ones a must buy.
customer_reviews.author: lisa c.

customer_reviews.title: need strong hands
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my uncovered patio to hold cushions. Had trouble trying to put it together. Need strong hands/fingers. I'm 76. Called my son and he had it together in 20 minutes. Been sitting out in heavy rain for days. Open up top to get cushions out, and low and behold, everything was dry. I was very impressed. Perfect size for holding 2 throw pillows and full size glider cushion. Very good buy
customer_reviews.author: Holly Kitko

customer_reviews.title: Love this in my patio
customer_reviews.text: Love this storage container. It’s functional for a lot of things - sitting, storage, table. It was a lielke difficult for me to put together as it was not easy for me to get the pieces to snap together. Look forward to many years of use from this.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Calloway

customer_reviews.title: bigger than i thought
customer_reviews.text: makes a nice little chair but im not sure it would hold 300 lbs....but its god size and simple to assembe without tools....snap tite...and a nice little storage container ...loooks nice as well...genuine imitation barrel imitation
customer_reviews.author: Troy M.

customer_reviews.title: I am sure this will be a great addition to my patio for storage of pool equipment
customer_reviews.text: I haven't put this together yet, but based on other products by Keter that I have, I am sure this will be a great addition to my patio for storage of pool equipment, especially my pool vacuum hose and attachments that came with the pool, plus some of my pool toys. It will also serve nicely as a coffee table for my outdoor bench.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble and looks great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter who is 10 put this together in about 25 min. Easy to assemble loads of storage and looks great. I'm sure that it's not completely waterproof but because it's plastic it should do well outside and make a great table between two lounge chairs.
customer_reviews.author: l.eves

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and super easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I'am really happy with this purchase. The product comes in simple, protective packaging. The assembly instructions are clear and requires no tools. I am using it for garden hose storage but may purchase another for an outdoor side table. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimi

customer_reviews.title: Assembling
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to assemble last two side sections. Won't return because inconvenient to repack and take to UPS pickup.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted. Storage for towels etc The only complaint is it is difficult to clean the top-side. The grooves in the fake wood are difficult to clean. You need a horse brush or something like it to get in the grooves.
customer_reviews.author: David Harris

customer_reviews.title: Stores a bunch and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: We love this!! It looks great on our patio and easily holds all of our seasonal covers for patio furniture. Could hold even more. Assembly is easy but for interpreting photos. Price was right on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: KPLM

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and spacious for kids toys!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy storage container. Sturdy enough to sit on although we use it for surface space outdoors. Big enough for all my sons water guns and balls for outdoor play. Hoping this is sealed enough to keep out any spiders. Will update when I find out.
customer_reviews.author: Lovepeaceshop

customer_reviews.title: Useful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This product is durable and it looks good. It sits in the hot Cali sun and it looks as good as it did when I bought it in 2018. This product is not waterproof due to airflow/vents near the bottom. Overall solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Defective pieces. Had to return.
customer_reviews.text: I could not get this thing together after many hours and two people trying due to defects. I had seen the review of the product with defective tabs and I was hoping it wouldn't happen to me, but it did. Ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bower

customer_reviews.title: Great Product When You Figure Out How it Goes Together!
customer_reviews.text: I gave 3-Stars on easy to assemble because it was anything BUT easy... but, after a few thrown items, cussing like a sailor and kicking it, I finally got it put together. And once you do, this thing is solid and bigger than anticipated. Everything about this item is great, except assembly. I highly recommend you have an assistant.
customer_reviews.author: R Caylor

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Perfect way to gather up all my random gardening stuff to hide it. Perfect for watering can, gloves, soil, couple pots, still room for kids bubbles, some toys, etc. And doubles as an extra seat for the deck
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Large, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Almost every piece of furniture I own doubles as storage so I had to have this piece of patio furniture when looking! Directions weren’t the best but it was fairly common sense. It’s sturdy and has a large storage compartment. I plan on purchasing the cover for the winter time.
customer_reviews.author: HollyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Okay but quality not as good as I had expected
customer_reviews.text: It took me approx 25 minutes to assemble. It was tough to get the sides to snap together. Lots of force. Also the lid doesn’t lay completely flush with the box. As others have stated there’s some extra plastic on the top and bottom which you would want to trim off. I guess for the money ($60) it’s okay but the quality isn’t as good as I had expected. Most deck boxes are more expensive and I needed something simple that can also be used as a table.
customer_reviews.author: Rans

customer_reviews.title: Great looking deck box - using as a coffee table
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this and once you can get it clipped together it's a great piece. It's a little tricky getting everything to snap, especially at the end but it's so worth it. Love the look of this and has been holding up great with all the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wohn

customer_reviews.title: attractive seat
customer_reviews.text: I like this..... I would have given 5 stars...but...I have a few broken pieces of plastic in the bottom of the box.... the box was not taped or secured closed... looks like it had a tough trip getting here ....... we put it together..... and it appears to be ok..... I sat on it and it feels sturdy.....
customer_reviews.author: Grandmother

customer_reviews.title: SO functional
customer_reviews.text: I use this outside every day. It so so sturdy that you can use it as a table or a bench. And it has TONS of storage space. Assembly was a little difficult, but otherwise a good item.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Water Proof Storage
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these a year or a bit less ago, and leave them outside. We have had quite a bit of rain and cold, and copious amounts of sun, but these haven't faded and look good. We also use them as tables to snack on or play board games, mainly for storing outdoor pool equipment and gardening stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Vi

customer_reviews.title: I love Keter products and this is no exception
customer_reviews.text: Keter products are amazing, sturdy, stylish, easy to assemble, have ample storage, and are affordable. This adorable table is no exception. I have it in front of the Keter bench.
customer_reviews.author: elaine parseghian

customer_reviews.title: A must for every patio
customer_reviews.text: This storage table/seat is awesome. It was very simple to put together and is indeed waterproof. We store our pillows from our outdoor furniture when not using them and they have remained dry even after all the rain we have had this summer. It is durable, looks great and we have received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: reces

customer_reviews.title: Spacious, but difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely difficult to put together. Pieces do not latch together easily and you can tell that they are poorly made. Took over an hour to assemble with many cuts and scrapes on my hands afterward. Once assembled it’s a good item, although not necessarily rain proof.
customer_reviews.author: RN

product_meta.title: Keter Circa 37 Gallon Round Deck Box, Patio Table for Outdoor Cushion Storage, Brown
product_meta.description: Color:BrownIf you have a small yard, you won't want it cluttered with large outdoor storage boxes that take up most of your space. That’s why you want the Circa Deck Box. You will enjoy 37-gallons of interior storage capacity perfect for storing garden supplies, decorative outdoor pillows, pool floats, toys, pet supplies and more. Its ventilated sides ensure that everything you store stays safe and dry no matter what the weather while keeping your outdoor space clutter free.
feature_bullets: DIMENSIONS: Exterior: 26. 7 in. Diameter x 16. 5 H in. / Interior: 23. 5 in. Diameter x 15. 7 in.
IDEAL STORAGE: 37 gallon internal storage capacity
RESIN CONSTRUCTION: It's made out of all weather-resistant resin with an appealing wood-look texture
DURABLE AND STRONG: Weather-resistant polypropylene construction prevents rusting, peeling and denting - unlike real wood
EXTRA SEATING: Provides comfortable bench seating with a weight capacity of 308 lbs.
EASY ASSEMBLY: Simple and quick assembly with no extra tools required
VERSATILE STORAGE: Perfect place to store outdoor toys, pool accessories, and beach towels. Or use as a storage ottoman, side table, or patio table.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,312 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
